ndk {

            exclude "lib/arm64-v8a/weexcore.so"
        }

Solved! 
It because I used the `width: 100%; height: 100vh` on the `<web>`. That should be `px`;

> http://dotwe.org/vue/dcac1550b4467965e0251ef7ca1c4222

> 在Weex Playground中会触发，使用Weex Playground APP 不能触发

这个是那个平台的，iOS还是Android出现的问题？

Not sure what's your problem. I am the same behaviour between android and iOS with you [demo](http://dotwe.org/vue/ed3c7bb018740f01ad003bff7dafb19d) and `weex 0.24`

I will just close the issue, feel free to reopen it if you have further question. (*I only response to issues that are opened*)

>     * A private page/SVN to host private key for the following:

Infra can provide something equivalent to `https://svn.apache.org/repos/private/pmc/cordova/` (if this doesn't exist already)

加不加回车并不影响。这里WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC宏实际是给OC类添加一个特定前缀的方法，至于 __LINE只是为了这些方法selector名字不一致（但是有相同前缀）。这样在初始化weexsdk时，利用oc runtime拿到OC类的所有selectors，然后过滤出带这个前缀的方法们，依次调用这些方法，拿到要注册给前缀的真正接口名称。所以你加回车，也只是这些方法名的行号变了一下，并不影响weexSdk拿到真正要的方法名。只要WX_EXPORT_METHOD_SYNC(xxx)这些代码不在 **同一行** 就可以。

到于方法丢失的问题，是weexsdk的多线程问题。参考这个PR进行修改，或升级到最新版本即可。https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/pull/2394
加个异常断点，看看具体抛出来的异常是什么
看你的截图我感觉是instanceId为空
这个是服务端的问题，建议做代码参考，不用在意能否连上。之后我们有时间会再看一下这个demo。谢谢
Thanks, I just submitted a JIRA ticket to INFRA.

Richtext could not support lines attribute. http://dotwe.org/vue/a4cfb55a2d9c12735e5cbeb3496df364
从log看没有问题，只要保证instance的destroyInstance方法被调用，并且instance对象dealloc即可。关于一些jsLog: Error错误已经在新版修复，可以试一下。谢谢
建议检查自己的工程，如果不能解决，可以把安装好依赖的工程压缩发给我们

WXRecyclerComponent继承自WXScrollerComponent
WXScrollerComponent支持alwaysScrollableHorizontal和alwaysScrollableVertical两个属性。
参考这个demo http://dotwe.org/vue/df57d60ff368acc4e62b9f97c3e7c033
你好，weex支持的appear事件是在可滚动的组件（scroller）里才会被触发，可以参考文档https://weex.apache.org/zh/docs/events/common-events.html#appear。你的例子里没有scroller组件，所以无法触发。

Just got response from our developer, `waterfall` doesn't support web, it only supports iOS and Android. I will make sure the document is clear about that.

I can reproduce the bug in a Xiaomi Mi Mix 2 (gesture-based navigation, no nav bar) (using v0.20.3.0-beta). I cannot use v0.24.0, since it causes the "render error -1001" depicted in #2495.
The workaround that I've been using is to calculate the reported aspect ratio, add a small amount (30px), approximate it to a list of common aspect ratios and then set it as a vuex variable. 
A fix is needed, though, and my workaround is extremely bad practice.

Weex reports a height of 2030 px, but my device is 2160 pixels tall.
I am using so files and SDK source code in playground project. I think it may be so file error or code error in WXSDKEngine that caused the loading of wrong so files.
